Key Match Events: Lane Thomas and José Ramírez hit back-to-back homers in the eighth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Cleveland fans felt a weight lift off their shoulders as the Guardians won 6-1
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians' lead in the American League Central remains at three games due to the Royals' loss earlier in the day
Others: Joey Cantillo tossed five scoreless innings for the Guardians
